abstract: Douglas V. DeCinces, a former third baseman for the Baltimore Orioles and California Angels, and three others are said to have traded on a merger tip.
snippet: Douglas V. DeCinces, a former third baseman for the Baltimore Orioles and California Angels, and three others are said to have traded on a merger tip.
lead_paragraph: Baseball fans of a certain age — i.e., mine — will remember Douglas V. DeCinces, a standout third baseman for the Baltimore Orioles and California Angels.

headline.main: S.E.C. Accuses Former Baseball All-Star of Insider Trading
